title: Changing date in marriage certificate to get some benefits
transcript: shake I have a question can I change date on my marriage certificate to submit in office to get some benefits from the government or can I make a fake certificate or can I do niihka again please share reply to me it's urgent as there is no changing the date on your marriage certificate would be cheating and a lie regardless of the reason and most likely you want to submit it so you can get back pay probably or something like that this or to be admitted to a new law where you can get more money this is not permissible it is cheating
